title: Whole game lagged and towerc ouldnt attack, a psychedelic experience
body:
Today i played a ranked.
As soon as we entered the game everyone was lagging, all 10 players.
Even the mobs were lagging and jungling was werid as hell, let alone last hitting for a laner.
The towerd didnt seem to work, and as kha'zix i got weirdly teleported around whenever i attempted to jump.
We planned on getting herald to let him push thorugh since towers didnt work but before that, at minute 15 of mind expanding psychedelic trip shit, the attempting to reconnect sign appeared and i tried to restart the game.
When i got to the client there was no rejoin game button and it was just the normal client.
Goodbye oh best game of my life, goodbye.
I rate this experience 10/10, thanks riot.

> {{item:3649}}

replies.body:
I just experienced it too in an Aram.

After everyone was lagging, at some point everyone got a disconnect and could not reconnect even after restart the Client.

Same experience here. 
But lucky for me, it was only in a bot game.

Dunno what exactly happend there, but i got a disconnect too and after a relogg i was only in the client. 
The game wasnt in my matchhistory, so its like ive never played this game. 
And yea, im a bit tiltet too. 
(sry for my bad english)
